      • loadFromDisplay

        public void loadFromDisplay​(java.lang.String displayTxt)
        This function will load the data from the user input. Which is String. and it will separate the string by splitting comma (,) convert the string into double and storing into the randomNumbers variable (Arraylist of double)
        Parameters:
        displayTxt - The user input

      • loadFromTxt

        public java.lang.String loadFromTxt()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This function will load the data from the text file. Which is String. and it will separate the string by splitting comma (,) convert the string into double and storing into the "randomNumbers" variable (ArrayList of double)
        Returns:
        The values from the text file as a String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the system fails to read the file

      • loadFromRandom

        public java.lang.String loadFromRandom()
        This function will create 1000 random numbers
        Returns:
        String value of generated random number

      • reset

        public java.lang.String reset()
        This function will reset the values of the "randomNumbers" variable (ArrayList of double). After running this function there will be no values inside the variable
        Returns:
        An empty value to clear the data set

      • sqrt

        public static double sqrt​(double number)
        This function is returning the square root of a value.
        Parameters:
        number - The number to get the Square root of
        Returns:
        The Square root of the given parameter

      • getXValueMinusMean

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getXValueMinusMean()
        This method is used in mean absolute deviation and standard deviation. it will return the each Xi values after subtracting
        Returns:
        ArrayList of deviation
